description.value:
Granted Powers: You manipulate shadows and darkness. In addition, you receive Blind-Fight as a bonus feat.

Domain Spells:

  • 1st—@Compendium[pf1.spells.tuh5vc2bojaws3ig]{Obscuring Mist}
  • 2nd—@Compendium[pf1.spells.k7cf5gshkp8xxqux]{Blindness/Deafness} (only to cause blindness)
  • 3rd—@Compendium[pf1.spells.jdsvncnna6oy189a]{Deeper Darkness}
  • 4th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.ed7fvzc2p4m6n7a2]{Shadow Conjuration}
  • 5th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.hd7ukybisvv7j5r6]{Summon Monster V} (summons 1d3 shadows)
  • 6th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.btoow6tyv39443gh]{Shadow Walk}
  • 7th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.gado7zyg5knc83ir]{Power Word Blind}
  • 8th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.967ur7a9xepd704y]{Shadow Evocation, Greater}
  • 9th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.xxaycxbdsmalf5ov]{Shades}
